review: Get this game if you liek anime CHIBI! c:

Shooting guns out of a 'French Tin Can' (French Car)?! F*** YES!!! Dying as soon as you poke your head out a window? God damn, this is more of a real deal than ArmA!! Don't have any ammo left? That's okay. Just lop two or three grenades at that dude's face and you'll be right.This game is more deadly than the Northern Terriory.999/10: Chuck us a beer.
THIS GAME IS ADORABLE AS HELL <3 <3
